title: The Love Story Of A Self-Proclaimed Mob Character, A Young Man Who Has Been Doted On By The Story’s Perfectly Beautiful Main Heroine - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Loner Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Mob Protagonist   Sword And Magic
author: Eiyuutan   Gray Rat   Haiiro no Nezumi   灰色の鼠   英雄譚
description:
It's not a world where anyone can be the main character.

Lute, the protagonist of this story who has everything: honor, fame, money, power, and women, has stolen my childhood friend that I loved, and it seems that she became one of his harem members.

In the face of Lute, who is capable of defeating the demon king and is popular enough to build a harem, I realize that I am a mob in this story.

The main heroine of the story that Lute is so crazy about that he can't even look at the other heroines.

In the course of the story, it should be her fate to be attached to the hero, but for some reason, the heroine dotes on me, the mob.

This is an unexpected romantic comedy story that unfolds at a magic academy in a fantasy world.
>
